points: 日本語を三年ぐらい勉強しています。好きです。— I've been studying Japanese for about 3 years. I like it!
I'm currently working on a TD game using Godot! I got to play with flow fields and multi-threading.
Coursera, Udemy, and Youtube have lots of tech content; I like to learn from these places.
Attended Canadian University Software Engineering Conference (CUSEC) 2020.
Set up laptop with IOMMU to pass a dedicated GPU to VMs
